about_the_game:
Interested? Wishlist now and Follow to stay updated!

DR4X delivers fast, bite-sized, turn based 4X gameplay packed with endless strategic choices and assymetric factions.

Finish a skirmish in under an hour, whether you're a Kingdom, Bandits, a Rat King, or a Dark Lord. From ruling kingdoms to managing Inns to battling demonic goats.

The options are endless in DR4X.

Notable Features

  • Chaotic fast paced gameplay!

  • Story rich single player campaign with five endings, meta elements, and fully voiced briefings, where each mission has "standard" and "unconventional" victory!

  • Highly customizable skirmish mode with almost limitless options!

  • Asymmetric gameplay--No two factions play the same!

  • Faction-specific gameplay and goals!

  • A beautiful, original soundtrack.

  • You can pet a dog. (Yes, you read that right!)

The Game

DR4X includes an in-depth skirmish customizer, allowing you to design (and share) distinct fantasy settings complemented by a broad range of gameplay styles! Decide your realm's age, its savagery level, the types of bandits and kinds of monsters, invading dark forces, and much, much more! Occasionally, your skirmish settings even unlock new win conditions.

Once you've made your choices, the world is procedurally generated, incorporating elements like artifacts that are randomly created in accordance with the age of the realm.

After which you can dive into a lively ever-changing world where, without intervention, dens of beasts and camps of bandits will spread across the realm, paired with unique random events that bring the world to life based on your settings.

Before jumping in you can choose your faction and each faction and sub faction uses different resources and completely unique playstyles.

Research powerful technologies and utilize game changing "Tile Effects", like the Cults ability to do a "Mass Sacrifice" when building hideouts! Or the kingdom's ability to Annex all surrounding holds simply by building a guard house!

Each choice and technology adds new possibilities and alters the course of your realm.

Do you want to fight other empires? Or just defeat the monsters infesting the realm. Or maybe even be the monsters infesting the realm! It is all your choice!

If you're not inclined towards skirmishes, the game also offers a unique single-player campaign, complete with five endings and a series of unlockable missions. Each mission has voiced briefings, reminiscent of classic retro games, and has multiple 'routes' to victory. Set against the dramatic backdrop of a realm under a mysterious invasion, this campaign blends modern, story-intensive visual novel elements with completely unique meta horror aspects and 'Coffee Break' 4X gameplay. As of now, you can fully play through the first chapter of the in development six part campaign!

Everything is fine.

Its. Perfectly. Safe.

DR4X, An RBI Game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Might even run fine on older processors.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GEForce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A fast, casual haunted 4X game with asymmetric factions and roguelike elements. Enjoy brief, 30-turn skirmishes in a unique setting filled with strategic choices, or delve into a story-rich campaign with 5 different endings—all without the slow and tedious 'long wars' typical of the genre.
